title: leaverbuster isnt working and after 10 minutes it resets to 20 minutes
body: riot u better do something, im not dealing with this today

replies.body: Hey there, it sounds like your network could be unstable and losing sync with matchmaking so it's kicking you off.  You may want to stick to customs for now and use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot any snags including whatever could be causing the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) in the first place.  I hope that helps!

sounds like your network could be unstable and losing sync with matchmaking if it is happening to multiple people. maybe you guys should use your connection issues guide to troubleshoot any snags including whatever could be causing the leaverbuster in the first place.

BTW did you just randomly post that and not read it. Did you watch the replay of why I got leaver buster? Because it was not warranted.... Or do you read at all. I was there for the last hit of the nexus....
I may have even been the last hit of the nexus, so please enlighten me on how I'm a leaver?
